rule: Terms for general themes refer to broad and overarching subjects or ideas conveyed by the input text content.
input: Themes of globalization and technological advances.
coverage:
Company names: 
People names: 
Specific topics: Globalization, Technological advances
General themes: Globalization, Technology
validityText:
The input provided is a string consisting of a passage of text. Upon evaluation, the text mentions general themes: "globalization" and "technological advances," which are relevant to the content. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing a passage of text and can include general themes, which this input satisfies. There are no specific constraints in the input specification regarding the length or detailed content of the passage, just that it should be a passage of text, which this input meets.

OK
